      public Map<Dish,Integer> getCart(int id) throws DBException
      Extracts data about cart of certain user from database
      Parameters:
      id - user's id
      Returns:
      a map of dishes and their amount in a cart
      Throws:
      DBException - if any SQLException was caught

      public void submitOrder(int userId, Map<Dish,Integer> cart) throws DBException

      Parameters:
      userId - user's id
      cart - user's cart represented by a map of dishes and their amount
      Throws:
      DBException - if any SQLException was caught
